headline: AIG to Participate in the 2025 KBW Insurance Conference
summary: NEW YORK, August 27, 2025--American International Group, Inc. (NYSE: AIG) today announced that Peter Zaffino, AIG Chairman & Chief Executive Officer, will participate in the 2025 KBW Insurance Conference on Wednesday, September 3, 2025, at 4:20 p.m. ET.
